Others: The Detroit Pistons defeated the Toronto Raptors 99-95.
Cade Cunningham, Jaden Ivey, Malik Beasley, Wendell Moore Jr., and Marcus Sasser were the top performers for the Pistons.
Wendell Moore Jr. and Marcus Sasser provided a significant boost in the fourth quarter.
Ron Holland II had a strong game with 10 points, 8 rebounds, and 3 steals.
Jaden Ivey returned from injury and contributed 14 points in 28 minutes.
Tim Hardaway Jr. and Simone Fontecchio were unavailable due to injuries.
